summary: Not so long ago Ronny aka Clowns Norry and his crew were at the top of showbiz. Until he made a mistake that made headlines in the tabloids. Since then he has to struggle with a heap of ... See full summary Â»
cast: Frank Aendenboom|Silke Becu|Luc Caals|Johnny de Mol|Veerle Dejonghe|Diederik Ebbinge|Eddy Faus|Norbert Kaart|Manou Kersting|Kimberly Klaver|Katja Schuurman|Peter Thyssen|Hilde Uitterlinden|Luc Verhoeven|Chris Willemsen|Luk Wyns
title: Crimi Clowns: De Movie
